text: Hi there! <@U04B32JHTUZ> is there any updates?

Today I tested it with a few API calls and it is working fine now..
IDK maybe they've fixed it now:sweat_smile:
<@U07BCH3K9N3> just in case, can you please also provide an `integreationThreadId`  / portalId combo where you are currently experiencing the issue?

thanks Ashish, glad to hear its working now - and im still looking into that particular `integrationThreadId` - from our perspective it should never happen, so if you provide examples it will be easier to debug on our end
